column1: Uchi////After dropping a small mint at the Uchi in Austin years ago I decided to save HOUchi for a special occasion. Extra glad a friend insisted on happy hour (termed social hour)
column2: because it was a delight. The ten menus put in our hands were a little overwhelming but well managed by the entire staff's ability to recite
column3: explain and culture on each item. At points the number of staff hit diminishing returns. But we filled our bellies
column4: only strayed once from the social hour menu and left happy and each only $30 lighter. Will def. return. For social hour.
